login.title: Log in to Eliteon
login.terms: By continuing you agree to Eliteon's Terms of Service, including Additional Terms, and Privacy Policy.

signup.title: Join Eliteon today
signup.subtitle: Creating an account allows you to follow your favorite celebrities and get their exclusive products.
signup.yupPassword: Passwords must be at least 8 characters.
signup.terms: By creating an account, you agree to Eliteon's Terms of Service, including the Additional Terms and Privacy Policy.
signup.scoreVal0: Keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
signup.scoreVal1: This is a very common password. Add more words or characters.
signup.scoreVal2: Your password is vulnerable. For your security, we recommend improving it.
signup.scoreVal3: That's a good password, but you can make it even better.
signup.scoreVal4: Great password! Use it only here to help protect your account.
signup.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
signup.validEmail: You will need to verify that you are the owner of this email account.
signup.passwordMinLength: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.
signup.passwordAscii: Password can only contain ASCII characters.
